name: Stranded (itch) (geist_191, Nippaaah, Dr4g0nsoul, FlyWolfe, Shivi Vats)
name_original: Stranded (itch) (geist_191, Nippaaah, Dr4g0nsoul, FlyWolfe, Shivi Vats)
description:
Sling your way around a beautiful space environment in this 2d space adventure.

With orbital gravity, platforming takes on a whole new meaning.

Use A and D to walk left/right

Click and drag, then release to sling yourself through the world

Collect coins and parts, repair your spaceship, and save yourself from the dangers of these worlds. Avoid lava, cannons, lava bees, and icicles or die trying!

Good luck!

This game has been developed by:

Simon Bernard, Shivi Vats, Thomas Rizzolli, Mathew Sherry, and Maria Efthymiadou
